0.2.name: wordpress/pixopoint-email-submit
0.2.description:
The PixoPoint Email Submit plugin allows you to acccept email submissions on your site, and store those in your WordPress database. You can access these files in comma delimited form via the plugins admin page (under settings).

Visit the PixoPoint Email Submit page for more information. If you find any bugs, please report them in the PixoPoint support forum.

Please note that we are not accepting unpaid requests for improvements or unpaid support for this plugin. The PixoPoint Email Submit plugin was created for a specific site and we do not have time to provide free technical assistance for it unfortunately.
